metadata.title: CVE-2017-2464 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3 isaffected. Safari before 10.1 is affected. tvOS before 10.2 is affected. Theissue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption andapplication crash) via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2464` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.16.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.16.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.16.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.16.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.16.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.16.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.16.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
